title: Pixelift Image Tools 2025: Complete Guide to AI-Powered Photo Editing
content:
All-in-One AI Image Editing

Pixelift offers a comprehensive suite of AI-powered image tools that can transform, enhance, and create stunning visuals in seconds. From background removal to image upscaling, colorization to format conversion, every tool is powered by cutting-edge AI technology. This guide covers all available tools and how to get the most out of each one.

Background & Object Tools

Background Remover

Instantly remove backgrounds from any image with pixel-perfect precision.

  • Features: One-click removal, edge refinement, hair detection
  • Best for: Product photos, portraits, e-commerce
  • Output: Transparent PNG

The AI detects subjects with incredible accuracy, handling complex edges like hair, fur, and translucent objects. Perfect for e-commerce product shots and professional portraits.

AI Background Generator

Generate custom backgrounds from text descriptions.

  • Features: Text-to-background, subject-aware placement, style matching
  • Best for: Product mockups, creative compositions, lifestyle shots
  • Output: Composite image with AI-generated background

Describe the background you want and watch AI create it perfectly matched to your subject. Create product shots in any setting without expensive photography.

Object Removal

Remove unwanted objects, people, or elements from photos.

  • Features: Intelligent inpainting, seamless blending, multiple object removal
  • Best for: Photo cleanup, real estate photography, removing distractions
  • Output: Clean image with objects removed

The AI fills in removed areas naturally, matching surrounding textures and lighting for undetectable results.

Inpainting

Edit specific parts of images with AI assistance.

  • Features: Selective editing, content-aware fill, text-guided changes
  • Best for: Photo retouching, content modification, creative edits
  • Output: Edited image with seamless modifications

Paint over areas you want to change and describe what should replace them. The AI generates content that blends perfectly.

Image Expand (Outpainting)

Extend images beyond their original borders.

  • Features: AI-generated extension, aspect ratio changes, panoramic creation
  • Best for: Changing aspect ratios, creating panoramas, adding context
  • Output: Expanded image with AI-generated content

Need a square image from a portrait? Want to show more of the scene? Expand intelligently adds realistic content.

Enhancement & Restoration

AI Upscaler

Increase image resolution up to 8x while adding detail.

  • Features: 2x, 4x, 8x upscaling, detail enhancement, noise reduction
  • Best for: Printing, large displays, recovering low-res images
  • Output: High-resolution image with enhanced details

Transform low-resolution images into print-ready quality. The AI doesn't just enlarge - it intelligently adds realistic details that weren't in the original.

Photo Restore

Repair and restore old, damaged, or degraded photos.

  • Features: Scratch removal, tear repair, color restoration, clarity enhancement
  • Best for: Family photos, historical images, damaged prints
  • Output: Restored high-quality image

Bring old family photos back to life. The AI repairs physical damage, removes scratches, and can restore faded colors.

Colorize

Add realistic color to black and white photos.

  • Features: Automatic colorization, period-accurate colors, natural skin tones
  • Best for: Historical photos, family archives, artistic effect
  • Output: Full-color image from B&W original

The AI understands context - it knows grass is green, sky is blue, and applies period-appropriate colors to clothing and settings.

Portrait Relight

Change the lighting in portrait photos.

  • Features: Virtual lighting, shadow adjustment, dramatic effects
  • Best for: Portrait enhancement, mood adjustment, fixing bad lighting
  • Output: Portrait with modified lighting

Transform flat, poorly-lit portraits into professionally-lit images. Add dramatic side lighting, soft diffused light, or studio-quality illumination.

Conversion & Formatting

Format Converter

Convert images between formats with optimization.

  • Features: PNG, JPG, WebP, AVIF, GIF, BMP, TIFF
  • Best for: Web optimization, compatibility, file size reduction
  • Output: Image in chosen format

Convert between any common image format with quality optimization. Perfect for web performance or compatibility needs.

Image Compressor

Reduce file size without visible quality loss.

  • Features: Smart compression, quality presets, batch processing
  • Best for: Web performance, email attachments, storage optimization
  • Output: Compressed image

AI-powered compression finds the perfect balance between file size and quality. Reduce images by 80% with imperceptible quality difference.

Resize Image

Change image dimensions with smart scaling.

  • Features: Custom dimensions, aspect ratio lock, presets for social media
  • Best for: Social media, print preparation, web optimization
  • Output: Resized image

Resize for any platform with presets for Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube thumbnails, and more.

Crop Image

Crop images with smart composition guides.

  • Features: Rule of thirds, golden ratio, aspect ratio presets
  • Best for: Composition improvement, format adjustment
  • Output: Cropped image

Smart composition guides help you crop for maximum visual impact following photography best practices.

Vectorize

Convert raster images to scalable vector format.

  • Features: SVG output, color simplification, path smoothing
  • Best for: Logos, icons, illustrations, printing at any size
  • Output: SVG vector file

Turn pixel-based images into infinitely scalable vectors. Perfect for logos, icons, and graphics that need to work at any size.

Creative Tools

Style Transfer

Apply artistic styles from one image to another.

  • Features: Multiple art styles, intensity control, content preservation
  • Best for: Artistic effects, creative projects, unique visuals
  • Output: Stylized image

Transform photos into artwork inspired by famous painters, artistic movements, or custom style references.

Reimagine

Create variations of existing images with AI.

  • Features: Creative variations, style mixing, prompt guidance
  • Best for: Creative exploration, A/B testing, inspiration
  • Output: AI-generated variations

Upload an image and get creative variations. Explore different directions without starting from scratch.

Image Filters

Apply professional filters and color grading.

  • Features: Preset filters, color adjustments, one-click enhancement
  • Best for: Quick enhancement, consistent style, mood setting
  • Output: Filtered image

Professional-grade filters for instant mood and style changes. Perfect for creating consistent visual branding.

Text Effects

Add stylized text overlays to images.

  • Features: Multiple fonts, effects, positioning, blending
  • Best for: Social media graphics, quotes, promotional materials
  • Output: Image with text overlay

Create eye-catching social media graphics with professional text effects and typography.

Collage Maker

Combine multiple images into layouts.

  • Features: Grid layouts, custom arrangements, background options
  • Best for: Photo collections, before/after comparisons, portfolios
  • Output: Collage image

Create beautiful photo collages with flexible layouts. Perfect for portfolios, comparisons, and social media.

Specialty Tools

QR Code Generator

Create custom, stylized QR codes.

  • Features: Custom colors, logo integration, artistic styles
  • Best for: Marketing materials, business cards, menus
  • Output: Custom QR code image

Generate QR codes that match your brand with custom colors, embedded logos, and even AI-generated artistic styles.

Logo Maker

Create professional logos with AI assistance.

  • Features: Text-based generation, style options, vector output
  • Best for: Brand creation, business logos, app icons
  • Output: Logo in multiple formats

Get professional logo concepts in seconds. The AI generates multiple options based on your brand name and preferences.

Structure Control

Generate images following structural references.

  • Features: Edge detection, depth mapping, pose following
  • Best for: Precise control over AI generation, matching compositions
  • Output: AI image following structure

Use reference images to control AI generation. Extract edges, depth, or poses and generate new content following the same structure.

Watermark Remover

Remove watermarks and text overlays.

  • Features: Intelligent detection, clean removal, pattern recognition
  • Best for: Personal use, cleaning own images
  • Output: Clean image without watermark

Remove watermarks from your own images or cleaning up unwanted text overlays. The AI reconstructs the underlying image naturally.

Getting the Best Results

Image Quality Tips

  • Use the highest resolution source images available
  • Ensure good lighting in original photos
  • For upscaling, start with the cleanest source
  • Use PNG for images needing transparency

Workflow Optimization

  • Background remove first, then generate new backgrounds
  • Upscale last after all edits are complete
  • Compress as the final step before publishing
  • Save originals before editing
